Yes, there is a section detailing the pricing for Copilot Individual on the page. The annual cost for Copilot Individual is $100 USD per year.  Current Page: https://github.com/features/copilot#pricing, Title: GitHub Copilot · Your AI pair programmer · GitHub

The features of Copilot Individual for GitHub Copilot include:

- **Chat**: Unlimited messages and interactions, context-aware coding support and explanations, and debugging and security remediation assistance.
- **Code Completion**: Real-time code suggestions and comments to code.
- **Smart Actions**: Inline chat and prompt suggestions, slash commands and context variables, and commit message generation.
- **Supported Environments**: IDE, CLI, and GitHub Mobile.
- **Management and Policies**: Public code filter.

Features not included in the Copilot Individual plan but available in other plans include conversations tailored to your organization’s repositories, answers based on your organization’s knowledge base, access to knowledge from top open source repositories, pull request diff analysis, web search powered by Bing (beta), fine-tuned models (coming soon as an add-on), pull request description and summarization, GitHub.com support, user management, data excluded from training by default, IP indemnity, content exclusions, SAML SSO authentication, and requirements for GitHub Enterprise Cloud.

The Copilot Individual plan is designed for individual developers, freelancers, students, and educators who wish to code faster and happier. It is priced at $10 USD per month or $100 USD per year, with a free trial available. Additionally, it is free for verified students, teachers, and maintainers of popular open source projects.
